tasks.task: Check planting depth and assess row unit performance
subtasks: Observe the field and identify areas for inspection
Use a leaf blower to remove loose soil from the row unit
Inspect the seed trench and closing wheels for compaction and proper seed placement
Measure planting depth using a tool or traditional method
Evaluate row unit performance and adjust as needed

tasks.task: Assess field conditions and soil compaction
subtasks: Walk through the field to observe visible signs of compaction
Use a leaf blower to check the integrity of seed placement and trench closure
Compare observed results with expected planting depth and row unit settings
Document findings for future reference or adjustments

tasks.task: Follow up with Agronomy Insights resources
subtasks: Visit Pioneer.com for more information
Follow Pioneer on Twitter and Facebook for updates

tasks.task: Assess field conditions and soil compaction
subtasks: Walk the field and observe for issues
Use the leaf blower to verify the extent of compaction

subtasks: Visit Pioneer.com for additional resources
